backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access‑controlled user profiles, file uploads, and CRUD maps for properties, houses, agents, and other records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint setting metadata, fonts, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing simple offline caching for core assets with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the application in an authentication provider.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: React auth context providing login/logout logic and persisted authentication state.
frontend/src/auth/authStore.ts: LocalStorage-based auth and credentials storage with default login values and verification logic.
frontend/src/components/AddReminderDialo: Modal form for creating a reminder with note, date, and time and submitting it upstream.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, user info, settings, online status, and logout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, main content outlet, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AttachmentPicker: UI control for adding, renaming, and removing file attachments using a file input.
frontend/src/components/AttachmentPrevie: Preview modal that displays images, videos, PDFs, or offers file download with fullscreen support.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Badge indicating online or offline status based on a network status hook.
frontend/src/components/ReminderModal.ts: Modal showing reminder details with options to dismiss or delete the reminder.
frontend/src/features/matching/dismissed: LocalStorage-backed helper functions for tracking dismissed match IDs.
frontend/src/features/matching/matchEngi: Frontend match engine comparing buyers and properties based on category, price, location, and area to produce scored matches.
frontend/src/features/search/searchIndex: Basic search utility that filters records by matching query text across common fields.
frontend/src/forms/CommercialLandForm.ts: Form for creating or editing commercial land records, including attachments, metadata, and save logic.
frontend/src/forms/CustomerForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing customer records with fields, priority, category selection, and saving via local repository.
frontend/src/forms/HouseForm.tsx: Form for adding or updating house listings, handling attachments, status, and saving records to local storage.
frontend/src/forms/OtherCategoryForm.tsx: Generic property form for custom categories, supporting attachments, status selection, and record saving.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and persistence through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalRepository.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on records, agents, attachments, reminders, and deals using local DB functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorageMode.ts: Manages and persists the app’s storage mode setting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed agent info with delete and document download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AgentListPage.tsx: Lists agents and provides a form to add new agents with optional file upload.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerListPage.tsx: Shows searchable customer records with support for starring and quick navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Provides search, reminders, starred records, and match suggestions for all stored records.
frontend/src/pages/DealPage.tsx: Manages creation and deletion of property deals, linking buyers and properties with deal details.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login form page that handles user credential input, validation, and navigation on successful login.
frontend/src/pages/NewEntryPage.tsx: Page for selecting a category and rendering the corresponding form to create a new record.
frontend/src/pages/RecordDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed view of a record with editing, deletion, attachment handling, and matching property logic.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for updating login credentials, choosing storage mode, and importing/exporting app data.
frontend/src/pages/SoldListPage.tsx: Lists all sold properties with search filtering and links to detailed record pages.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA capabilities.
frontend/src/storage/localDb.ts: IndexedDB wrapper providing CRUD operations for records, agents, attachments, reminders, and deals.
frontend/src/storage/storageMode.ts: Manages storage mode preference using localStorage with getter and setter functions.
frontend/src/utils/customerCategory.ts: Defines customer category constants and utilities for mapping legacy need values and converting categories to property types.
frontend/src/utils/excelIo.ts: Provides CSV-based Excel export for records, agents, reminders, and deals, including CSV escaping and file download handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout settings with plugin support.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing versions, architecture notes, existing features, and pending feature requests.
